185a7(nyi khri): par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i dang
185b1(nyi khri): tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni nam mnga'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/
185b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang ga bsam gtan rnams dang / mang med pa
185b3(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
185b4(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgro rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa/
185b5(nyi khri): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sem
185b6(nyi khri): can rnams la chos ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i ngang tshul can zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa
185b7(nyi khri): ste/ de ni mi 'gro mo 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// tshor ba dang ga 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro/
186a1(nyi khri): mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i spyod pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro/
186a2(nyi khri): mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags
186a3(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
186a4(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
186a5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
186a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
186a7(nyi khri): bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med pa ste/ de ni mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang /
186b1(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi lam du gyur pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/
186b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med
186b3(nyi khri): pa'i ngang tshul can te ga de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mo dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i
186b4(nyi khri): ngang tshul can te// de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngang tshul can/
186b5(nyi khri): te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag pa'i ngang tshul can
186b6(nyi khri): te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye mi 'gag pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
186b7(nyi khri): par byang ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so//
187a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi ngang tshul can he kade dag ni nga tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so//
187a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngang tshul can te ga de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgra/
187a3(nyi khri): brnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna brnyan la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mig yor gyi ngang tshul
187a4(nyi khri): can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ migayor la 'gro ba'i ma 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan gyi ngang tshul can te/
187a5(nyi khri): dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs brnyan la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smig rgyu'i ngang tshul can te// de dag ni ngang tshul de
187a6(nyi khri): las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smig rgyul 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chu bla'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci
187a7(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ chu bral 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'ang la'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro/
187b1(nyi khri): ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni drang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas kun
187b2(nyi khri): tu mtha' yas pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de tsa'i
187b3(nyi khri): phyir zhe na 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba dang bsnan pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te ga de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi
187b4(nyi khri): 'bar ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba dang bsnun pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dul
187b5(nyi khri): 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ong ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dala'o//
187b6(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phrad pa med pa dang / 'bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre
187b7(nyi khri): ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phrad pa med pa dang / 'bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med pa la 'gro ba
188a1(nyi khri): 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag nyid/
188a2(nyi khri): kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yongarab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can
188a3(nyi khri): dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / yongs su spong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshar bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i nga tshul
188a4(nyi khri): can te// de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor mthong ba po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag
188a5(nyi khri): pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/
188a6(nyi khri): bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni nga tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdug panyid kyang shin du med na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ 8
188a7(nyi khri): 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi rtag pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ba
188b1(nyi khri): la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang ka mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'dra' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na ka rab 'byor mi sdug pa/
188b2(nyi khri): nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni nga tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab
188b3(nyi khri): 'dod chags kyi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi nga tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'a'o//
188b4(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul da
188b5(nyi khri): las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gti mug gi dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i ngang tshul
188b6(nyi khri): can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin
188b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang
189a1(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang ga mnyam pa nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyis
189a2(nyi khri): mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod ga rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
189a3(nyi khri): gang la yang g.yo ba med de/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
189a4(nyi khri): gzugs nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de
189a5(nyi khri): dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha
189a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la
189a7(nyi khri): yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
189b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe nA/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu med na// de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lnga
189b2(nyi khri): gal yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir me na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba
189b3(nyi khri): 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor
189b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lha ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang
189b5(nyi khri): tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag
189b6(nyi khri): par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
189b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor lam nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzug/
190a1(nyi khri): med pa'i sems par 'jug pa dang // rnam par dathar ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nam par bar pamin cang pa ng+ga dang /
190a2(nyi khri): med pa dang // smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
190a3(nyi khri): pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas
190a4(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyi shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni nga tshul
190a5(nyi khri): de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lam
190a6(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
190a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor rang byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can
190b1(nyi khri): de dag ni nga bcul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub cing kyang shin tu mi dmigs na// de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs
190b2(nyi khri): so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
190b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa/ dge ba'i
190b4(nyi khri): rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// shes
190b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las la du sum cu drug pa'o// / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
190b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lams par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang / mtshan ma dang /
190b7(nyi khri): badzi lta bu thig tu 'gyur ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di lams par 'gyu
191a1(nyi khri): pa dag ni/ 'dod chags rnam par gsapa pa'i dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'thur // rgyang chub sems dpa' sams dang ldan bdu d+hu dang /
191a2(nyi khri): gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
191a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags
191a4(nyi khri): kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
191a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /
191a6(nyi khri): mug gi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su
191a7(nyi khri): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
191b1(nyi khri): nga ma 'angamangs su shes par 'gyur ba dngad nirnam pams cadas byin panyid kyi nga tshul can du 'gyur ro// bsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das cang chubs sasu pa' sum sa dang ban pa /
191b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can de/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems/
191b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can ni sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
191b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang de la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba
191b5(nyi khri): bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan/
191b6(nyi khri): las bzla bar bya'o zhes ge cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ da ci'i phyir zhe na/
191b7(nyi khri): rab byor gzugs kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go mad ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// raba' byer byang chub sems dpa' sems/
192a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes
192a2(nyi khri): pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
192a3(nyi khri): chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang shin tu med la/ byang
192a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'brel ba ma yin ces bya'o// rab 'byor go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel ba ma yin/ sems can dang/
192a5(nyi khri): 'brel ba ma yin/ srog dang 'bral ba ma yin// skye ba dang 'brel ba ma yin// gso ba dang 'brel ba ma yin/ skyes bu dang 'brel ba ma yin/ gang zag dang 'brel ba ma yin/ shed can
192a6(nyi khri): dang 'brel ba ma yin gshed bdag dang 'brel ba ma yin/ byed pa po dang 'brel ba ma yin/ tshor ba po dang 'brel ba ma yin/ shes pa po dang 'brel ba ma yin mthong ba po dang 'brel
192a7(nyi khri): ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthong ba po yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas ka de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o//
192b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
192b2(nyi khri): yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go char ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
192b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
192b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir
192b5(nyi khri): go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i/
192b6(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor/
192b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
193a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir so cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin ces bya'o//
193a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'og cha de ni dran pa'i bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir chen// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gnas pa yang shin tu med pa/
193a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
193a4(nyi khri): de ni yang dag par spong ba dang ga rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/
193a5(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/
193a6(nyi khri): brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i
193a7(nyi khri): phyir sen ga rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ga cha yang med pas// de'i phyir po cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid dang 'bral
193b1(nyi khri): ba ma tshan zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pang mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag ca gnas ma
193b2(nyi khri): su mya ngan las bkra bar bya'o zhes po cha bgos pa de dag gi ga cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
193b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/
193b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
193b5(nyi khri): kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/
193b6(nyi khri): sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na de skad du// byang chub sems dpa' sems
193b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de ltar po cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dog par mi bya'o zhes
194a1(nyi khri): smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes//
194a2(nyi khri): nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan/
194a3(nyi khri): las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom/
194a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin to// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin//
194a5(nyi khri): ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams
194a6(nyi khri): cad mtshan pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci yang ban/
194a7(nyi khri): par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/ gang la bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/
194b1(nyi khri): gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' snyom pa'o// bcom/
194b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis
194b3(nyi khri): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
194b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang sgom pa rnam par
194b5(nyi khri): sgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom po rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
194b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
194b7(nyi khri): tu phyin par bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngas
195a1(nyi khri): sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso dang
195a2(nyi khri): skyes bu dang / gang zag dang shed can dang / shed bdag dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
195a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi
195a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa rnam par sgom
195a5(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste kau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
195a6(nyi khri): pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar
195a7(nyi khri): gzhag pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang // stobs
195b1(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang ga lam sgom pa rnam par snyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang ga bsam gcan
195b2(nyi khri): rnams dang / mad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu dang / rnam par bang
195b3(nyi khri): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ba mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa rnam par skam pa'o// bcom ldan
195b4(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
195b5(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs
195b6(nyi khri): nga'i 'bras du sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
195b7(nyi khri): dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang ga rang byang chub kyi sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
196a1(nyi khri): sgom par rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te ga rab 'byor 'di lta steg shes rab
196a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
196a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang garten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom pa rnam/
196a4(nyi khri): dar sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/
196a5(nyi khri): ni sems can dang / srog dang ka 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang shed can dang gshed bdag dang / byed pa po dang gatshor ba po dang gshes pa po dang / mthong ba po sgom pa
196a6(nyi khri): rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
196a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta steg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
196b1(nyi khri): rnams sdom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ga bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med/
196b2(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ka mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
196b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgra sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rabu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
196b4(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o//
196b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
196b6(nyi khri): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za mo 'di la mngon par
196b7(nyi khri): chags pa med dam zhes// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
197a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
197a2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ga brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
197a3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor/
197a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'amangon par chag pa med dam zhes/ dngos
197a5(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med dam
197a6(nyi khri): zhes/ byang chub kyi phyogs chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang gatshad med pa dang / gzugs/
197a7(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon/
197b1(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par/
197b2(nyi khri): bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang // snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
197b3(nyi khri): bco brgyad la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad
197b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
197b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe pha rol gyis smras pa dang pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'am/ phyir mi ldog
197b6(nyi khri): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe ga pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197b7(nyi khri): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshi ga 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'grog pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang ka gti mug dang bcas pa'i sem
198a1(nyi khri): du bya/ bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe ga sbyin pa'i nga/
198a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
198a3(nyi khri): dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta ma zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste ga gal te phyir mi
198a4(nyi khri): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe ga mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la gzhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi
198a5(nyi khri): 'gyur zhing // de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dka' lathos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin
198a6(nyi khri): du yid la byed pa de bzhin du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag
198a7(nyi khri): par byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcings te bklag cing kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na ka de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
198b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe ga mi 'jigs mi dang sdug par mi 'gyur la gzhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur shing kho'i ying /
198b2(nyi khri): phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang khong du chud cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
198b3(nyi khri): po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zeb mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs ming dngang sdug par mi 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su num par mo 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
198b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
198b5(nyi khri): des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la brtag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
198b6(nyi khri): nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // rab 'byor stong pa
198b7(nyi khri): nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa la gsol ba'i ngas
199a1(nyi khri): pa dang nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang ga skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang ga kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa/
199a2(nyi khri): la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang ga de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang ga yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
199a3(nyi khri): pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
199a4(nyi khri): yin/ rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gnol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
199a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po zhe dgu pa// / gsol pa/
199a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing / mtshan ma mamachi
199a7(nyi khri): pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis
199b1(nyi khri): pa dang / de bzhin nying dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang // mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / milam dang
199b2(nyi khri): gzugs brlan dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ sa bcom ldan 'das byang
199b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched dang / khams dang
199b4(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags samaka' da
199b5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
199b6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi
199b7(nyi khri): sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
200a1(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan/
200a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang ga 'du shes dang ka 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
200a3(nyi khri): rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
200a4(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun lo rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzug med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
200a5(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ga mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
200a6(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang ga mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
200a7(nyi khri): par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog/
200b1(nyi khri): pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir ce nas rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas// gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma
200b2(nyi khri): song phyogs na yang mi dmigs pa doni yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so// gang la drangs
200b3(nyi khri): mi dmigs shing / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
200b4(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims
200b5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// /
200b6(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
200b7(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad
201a1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed//
201a2(nyi khri): nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhen
201a3(nyi khri): de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
201a4(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang /
201a5(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi
201a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
201a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
201b1(nyi khri): dgu dang garnam par bar ba'i ma rung ma nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa dang / mngon pa 'ashes pa rnams dang ting nge 'jim rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi bangan/
201b2(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhing
201b3(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mtsha
201b4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// // de nas
201b5(nyi khri): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lnga rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang ka lnga rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang pun+d+ha ri ka mang po khyer
201b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su mthor bar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bas phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs
201b7(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod do// 'khor nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
202a1(nyi khri): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'dri las/ 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnams
202a2(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
202a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
202a4(nyi khri): nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrim
202a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa tham
202a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnamar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang
202a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyang dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar
202b1(nyi khri): gsags nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa che bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stongs dang /
202b2(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden
202b3(nyi khri): ba dang ga bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jus
202b4(nyi khri): pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang
202b5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
202b6(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid bang yin pa dang / rnam pa
202b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de
203a1(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig bsde/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skye che/
203a2(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
203a3(nyi khri): su byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
203a4(nyi khri): su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a5(nyi khri): byin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pad
203a6(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// dngos po med pa'ing /
203a7(nyi khri): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su gyur med do//
203b1(nyi khri): dran panye bar bsas pa'i de brtson nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa steg gnyis su med cing gcig su byar med do//
203b2(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
203b3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / chad med
203b4(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su/
203b5(nyi khri): med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
203b6(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang gabyams pa chen
203b7(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
204a1(nyi khri): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / myir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'ing /
204a2(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
204a3(nyi khri): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka'
204a4(nyi khri): ning rtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o//
204a5(nyi khri): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i
204a6(nyi khri): bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
204a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa sten rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel b.ra'i drung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mtshan
204b1(nyi khri): panyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mul rnams
204b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
204b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//
204b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam
204b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
204b6(nyi khri): lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
204b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o//
205a1(nyi khri): rnam par bar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i so stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa dang / mngon par /
205a2(nyi khri): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
205a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
205a4(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / nas
205a5(nyi khri): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa steg gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skyes
205a6(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
205a7(nyi khri): cing gnyis su byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
205b1(nyi khri): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
205b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
205b3(nyi khri): med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
205b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
205b5(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing /
205b6(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhinang
205b7(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
206a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid nga
206a2(nyi khri): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
206a3(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so
206a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang /
206a5(nyi khri): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
206a6(nyi khri): dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
206a7(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las chung ba la thugs gsol/
206b1(nyi khri): chas bskas pa la gsol ba ma yin no// bci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltara'ang lnga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni rab cing mdakar la/ 'ong rudra bar dga'ading sa
206b2(nyi khri): med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ gzhi zhing phra bzhib mo mkhas shing rtog pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas
206b3(nyi khri): nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gang yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos
206b4(nyi khri): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di phab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
206b5(nyi khri): zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas su med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med
206b6(nyi khri): bzab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i drug mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
206b7(nyi khri): bamed pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos
207a1(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa'o// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang ka gang zag dang ga shed can dang gshed bdag dang
207a2(nyi khri): byed pa po dang / tsher ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po bab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang ka'adu byed dang ga rnam
207a3(nyi khri): par shes pa rab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i
207a4(nyi khri): phyir chos 'di zab bo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha/
207a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i dag dran
207a6(nyi khri): pa nye bar gzhog pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yin lag
207a7(nyi khri): brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rang po//
207b1(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag rnam par bar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ga mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
207b2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
207b3(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di 'ab bo// lha'i du dag rnam pa thams cad mchen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab po/ khwa'i tharnams kyis bsang pa
207b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
207b5(nyi khri): lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ tshor ba dang ka 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ skye mched
207b6(nyi khri): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang // byang chub kyi phyong
207b7(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu bdun dang / 'phags pag bden pa dang ka bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ka rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis pan/
208a1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ka gzungs kyi sgo dang /
208a2(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
208a3(nyi khri): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags ka mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags// chos zab mo 'di rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags ka mi gzung ba'i slad du ma 'a/
208a4(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang ga lam gyi rnam pa shes nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i
208a5(nyi khri): slad du bstan pa ma lags ka mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so// bdag ni gzugs can no// bdag gi tshor ba'o//
208a6(nyi khri): bdag gis tshor bar bya'o// bdag gi 'du shes so// bdag ni 'du shes can no// bdag gi 'du byed do// bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag gis rnam par
208a7(nyi khri): shes par bya'o// bdag gi skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// bdag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos can no// bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
208b1(nyi khri): bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
208b2(nyi khri): bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi
208b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi shes rab
208b4(nyi khri): pharol byin pa'o// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la sems par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po med
208b5(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro// bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// bdag gis dran pa nye bar gnag pa la spyad
208b6(nyi khri): par bya'o// bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lags dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag
208b7(nyi khri): gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang ga tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
209a1(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs dang / stong pa nyid dang / ma nam myed pa dang / sngon pa med pa dang / mngon pa sa /
209a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'o// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgol spyod par bya'o// bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams/
209a3(nyi khri): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni rgyun
209a4(nyi khri): du zhugs par 'gyur ro// bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
209a5(nyi khri): bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ro// bdag gi rang byang chub bo// bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bdag ni
209a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod / bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal ba/ lha'i bu dgang de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu das
209a7(nyi khri): 'din gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phying ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin// mi gdung ba'i phyir/
209b1(nyi khri): ma yin/ skyemached dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'thur ba sarung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma ston/ mi gsung ba'i phyir mtshan/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / spang banyid thams cad dang / rlu
209b2(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin// mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
209b3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin// mi bzung ba'i/
209b4(nyi khri): phyir ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang /
209b5(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin
209b6(nyi khri): mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin no// lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
209b7(nyi khri): gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams/
210a1(nyi khri): cad dang / byung brjid bams cad dang / byang chub kyi rgyags kyi chos sum ca bdun bzung par myid rdzu/ mi gzung ba mying spyad pa du / 'angams pa'i dre dang /
210a2(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sngon pa
210a3(nyi khri): med pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sa
210a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
210a5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i/
210a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// nang stong pa nyid bsgom par
210a7(nyi khri): mi nus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul/
210b1(nyi khri): kyi rkang pa rnams dang ka dbang po dang / skabs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan las rnams dang / 'phabs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bslus par minus so// rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa/
210b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad
210b3(nyi khri): dang rjes su mthun pa ste/ chos 'di 'ini chos gang rnams dang rjes su mthun pa lags sen/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi ba
210b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o//
210b5(nyi khri): chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang
210b6(nyi khri): rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni yang dag par spang ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 2
210b7(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
211a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/
211a2(nyi khri): dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
211a3(nyi khri): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni rnam patha
211a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ ci la rdzogs pa ma mchis pa lags shes na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma
211a5(nyi khri): mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la thogs pa ma mchis so//
211a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
211a7(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang // rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang
211b1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams
211b2(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so// rnam pa
211b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'dzegs pa ma mchis so// chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
211b4(nyi khri): mtha'i mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'bag pa ma
211b5(nyi khri): mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// chos
211b6(nyi khri): 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung
211b7(nyi khri): ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
212a1(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'du/
212a2(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rna/
212a3(nyi khri): rnams dang ga mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye mi dmigs pa
212a4(nyi khri): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
212a5(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
212a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
212a7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs
212b1(nyi khri): pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po
212b2(nyi khri): dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o//
212b3(nyi khri): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom 'das
212b4(nyi khri): kyi rjes su skyes so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni ci dang ci ston pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid las brtsams shing ston to// mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa
212b5(nyi khri): ma mchis pa las brtsams shing ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
212b6(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes zer ba ni/ ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshes
212b7(nyi khri): pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin na na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/ gnas/
213a1(nyi khri): brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na / thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
213a2(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin no// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin te / de bzhin gshegs
213a3(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin no// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin
213a4(nyi khri): du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin dug gnas
213a5(nyi khri): brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid cing la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du ka chos thams cad kyi de/
